form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 50157-102

full_text: Screened by NARA," 8/18/2023 PLACE EDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 28.11.88/86094070 CITY COUNTRY INDIA At the request of the American Consul at BOMBAY NAME AGE SEX DESAI HARIBHAI DHAYABHAI 74 M I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON C 414727 AHMEDABAD 21.3.88 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Has small left inguinal hernia. Mildly hypertensive - on medication; NO PULMONARY OR PLEURAL LESION SEEN. Chest X-ray report from Dr Dr. M. Tayabali KAHN TEST: NEGATIVE HTLV (III) ANTIBODIES ON (MRS) F E PALIA Blood serological report NOT DETECTED from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. Dr. H. R. Manchanda SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MEDICAL EXAMINER 30.11.88 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE : 1984 O - 443-720 Dept of State
